reviewtext: Maybe I should have known better but I am positive the description said the flash was automatic with the Canon camera that I have. I expected a flash that would adjust itself to the camera settings and provide the correct flash in all situations that were within it's range; not so. Or maybe it would work the other way around and the flash would set the camera settings; not so either. I'm going to check, and if there is such a flash, this one will go back; fast.
summary: Automatic means that it will work fine without a camera
